processor.name: UpdateAccountSubscriptions
processor.description: This plug-in applies the subscriptions present in the appropriate account template. (This is the template belonging to the nearest parent folder or corporate account with a template in the account hierarchy.)
processor.condition: CREATE PROCEDURE condition @_ExecutePlugin BOOLEAN OUTPUT, @Operation ENUM -- $ICE:('metratech.com','Operation')$, @ApplyAccountTemplate BOOLEAN, @b_cansubscribe BOOLEAN, @b_CanParticipateInGSub BOOLEAN, @ActionType ENUM -- $ICE:('metratech.com/accountcreation','ActionType')$, AS IF ( (@Operation != #metratech.com/Operation/Add#) AND (@ApplyAccountTemplate = TRUE) AND ((@b_cansubscribe = TRUE) OR (@b_CanParticipateInGSub = TRUE)) AND ((upper(CAST(@ActionType AS VARCHAR)) = 'ACCOUNT') OR (upper(CAST(@ActionType AS VARCHAR)) = 'BOTH')) ) SET @_ExecutePlugin = TRUE ELSE SET @_ExecutePlugin = FALSE
